wikipedia_page.main: Robin Walter Hislop (born 26 February 1992) is a Scottish rugby union player who plays for the Wasps in the RFU Premiership . He plays primarily at loose head Prop.

response: On 2 November, Magnus Bradbury, Rory Darge, Damien Hoyland and Rory Sutherland withdrew from the squad and were replaced by Nick Auterac, Scott Cummings, Robin Hislop and Javan Sebastian.
